website_summaries.verdict: An extremely popular CB with a significant learning curve, this radio has proven itself to be the very best.
pros: An impressive array of features and options, including built-in diagnostics and 4 display color choices
cons: Proper setup requires expertise and/or patience

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!  Just ready to be scared the first time that NOAA alarm goes off. Lol
customer_reviews.text: Love this. But just a warning, the NOAA will alarm with any storm nearby, even when you have the radio shut off. (It scared us the first time it happened. Lol) From what I am being told, that is normal for a CB with NOAA. But that feature has come in handy a few times so far. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best CB iv had in 30 years I all ways ...
customer_reviews.text: Best CB iv had in 30 years I all ways used cobra CB's the 29EX Radio has more features and built-in SWR to set in the antenna the weather station changed the screen color much more you will love it . So far picked some one from 20mil away . Great workmanship Cobra..
customer_reviews.author: troy b.gulley

customer_reviews.title: Okay so I just got this CB radio and opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I just got this CB radio and opened it up and I find out my cb Mike button is pressed in and won't come out. So another words it's stuck in the talk position
customer_reviews.author: Alfie mohr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the product for 3 months and it is already broken. I can't communicate with others as it consistently breaks up. People can't hear me & I can't hear them. Would not buy again & will have to replace this item.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa J.

customer_reviews.title: Check the screws!
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of minimal usage the clamp that hold the microphone cable lost a screw and then the wires broke off which makes the radio useless and the 2 screws for the power cable plug has also become loose and again with minimal usage
customer_reviews.author: USMC Veteran

customer_reviews.title: Works really well channel scan option is great the color changing display is really cool you can ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well channel scan option is great the color changing display is really cool you can have it match any interior or color of your truck or close to it it works great with my astatic 636l microphone overall I'm very pleased with it the only downside is that it doesn't have nightwatch capability in the knobs our little tough to turn when they're not completely broken in yet but that's a small detail unless you have bigger fingers then they're just hard to grasp but other than that fantastic radio
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: I love the back lighting on the face
customer_reviews.text: I love the back lighting on the face, I haven't messed with the Bluetooth part of it yet. Just a heads up, if you have a PA speaker it will NOT work with this CB. You want to get the nonbluetooth version if you want to use a PA.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Guy 06

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy, screen went out after barely a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CB in May of 2018 for my husband for Father’s Day. He just informed 7-19-2018 that the screen has went out. I was going to return it but my window has closed. He hasn’t physically had it a month yet, this is BS.
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and includes a scan function.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one since it has a scan function, and to replace another radio I had gotten at a truck stop. Everything on it works well, although the manual did neglect a couple features it has, such as Delta Tune. Although the scan function is a bit slow, it does help find radio traffic when things are quiet. Additionally, it also has a weather radio that uses your CB antenna to pull alerts in, and it WILL go off when an alert is issued. While it plays the alert automatically, I do wish it would switch back to the CB when the weather announcement is complete. (This may be a limitation of the weather system.)
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Love this Radio
customer_reviews.text: I've used it on many trips now in some serious snow storms. It really helps to ask Truckers what's going on up the road, and tell them what's going on where I just came from. A must have for a job that requires frequent travel. The Weather Band is awesome as well. The only thing I don't understand about the radio is that it has a feature that will turn it on in case of an alert, it comes on makes a noise and goes right back off without playing the message. I don't know if that how it's supposed to work or it's defective.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Brink

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: SO AWESOME! I bought this for my husband since we travel so much. I follow him as he pulls our travel trailer. ALot of times I drive ahead to make sure the route is clear or good to pull the trailer through and it was always a pain to use our cell phones to call each other. Having the cobra CBs is perfect. Quick responses, clear and looks cool too! Edited: I recommend getting a really good antenna
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst product I have ever bought from Amazon. When I tried to contact the third party seller, I could not contact anyone about the defective product and they never would return my messages that I left them. I got stuck with a product that does not work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have tried to contact the company and can't reach anyone for questions!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to this and did not know I needed and antenna also needed a power pack for home use. Have questions for Cobra but can't reach them through the customer service number. So therefore I can not rate this item
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L. Brinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome CB
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Cobra29. I have come to depend on them. I pair them with K-40's, (, and they always perform. I do take them to a radio shop and have them peaked and matched. I don't think that this is necessary, but, I like things done right. It only costs about $50.00 and only has to be done once. I have easily talked 8-10 miles between vehicles while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: ScottJ

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought it June 12th & it quit working September 15th!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby drives a dump truck. He's constantly on or listening to his CB. He loves it! The other truckers love it too! A five star rating From him is a big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: RN K

customer_reviews.title: Buy a CB Radio that works.
customer_reviews.text: The Cobra CB Radio used the be the best on the market. But, their quality has dropped to rock bottom. The cobra 29 XLBT came with a lot of tech problems right out the box. I would not buy this radio again.
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: No PA option
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading all the reviews. Unfortunately I read the reviews and looked at the photo reviews which shows the model with the”PA” option which the one I bought does not have. The button CB/WX in the reviews also has a PA function. It’s still decent and I should have looked closer at my purchase rather than the reviews with all different models.
customer_reviews.author: JVBMD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this radio for my husbands birthday last year. This year I upgraded him to the Cobra 29 LX BT with Bluetooth. But Cobra is a great radio period. The 29 LX worked great right out of the box with no tuning. Obviously you can get it tuned and it'll reach further but for using it right out of the box it did a great job. Really can't beat it for the price. He loved this cb and the different color LCD screens. No issues at all. I'd recommend it to anyone that wants a good working radio without spending a couple hundred.
customer_reviews.author: Skii

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: Pros; Good features, great reach compaired to the Uniden 520. Very nice radio. Cons; Slowly drains battery when all features are off. When I store my Jeep for the winter I unplug it. Big radio!
customer_reviews.author: TJ cpl

customer_reviews.title: Very good CB
customer_reviews.text: Stepped up and bought this after having the 29 ltd for years. I really like that it is Cobra quality but with extras. The blue tooth was easy to set up and works great. The radar/road emergency works well with its app. Got it tuned and peaked and using a FireStik 5 feet II TUNABLE TIP BLACK . Reaches and receives very well.
customer_reviews.author: Winbaby

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, and it's really fun. Installation is simple, so is wiring it in. I found the aux power fuse and shoved the hot wire and the fuse back into the slot. Honestly, it took more time to set up my whips and to wire my coax cable into the cab without drilling through the firewall. Make sure to get good antennas and to get them up high in the sky. The thing I like most of the cb is that it has a clock, something my aftermarket radio doesn't have. It is a real fun thing to have, listening to truckers is very entertaining. Just watch what you say to the other people on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Knecht

customer_reviews.title: ... it about 2 years now and can't say a bad thing about it
customer_reviews.text: Had it about 2 years now and can't say a bad thing about it. Great pricing and service from the seller, delivered quickly. Radio is fantastic and exceeds my needs. Really enjoy the scan and wx band features. Teamed it eith a 36"Firestik. I use it for offloading vandalism trail communication as well as cross country driving. Live info ftom professional drivers is faster than gps. You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BBT8831

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality
customer_reviews.text: took it out of the box and never worked. I sent it to Cobra for repair, wanted to charge me $52.00 for repairs. Still under warranty, just fix it and return it. Questionable quality now.
customer_reviews.author: Mattman1961

customer_reviews.title: The 29ltd on steroids !
customer_reviews.text: I love the new features of our Cobra 29Lx Professional CB Radio, revamped old 29ltd . The digital face is a true improvement from our old school 29ltd classic. The scan mode is also a plus . I plan on testing this to the max in the future as the wife and I have road trips planned and keeping life reports from the hiway will be useful especially in traffic backups and beyond what our GPS gives . And we can ask details about road conditions! Looks great and fits nicely in our 2008 Jeep Liberty.
customer_reviews.author: Maricar

customer_reviews.title: Sleak, strong, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio. Strong signal, easy to set up. Keeps me alert of weather and let's me chit/chat where ever I'm at. I haven't gotten the app to connect right, the bluetooth feature us a pain to set up. But the radio itself is great at all channels and the weather feature has helped more than once to avoid bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cb daily and never been disappointed and whenever I thought it finally died on me it was always just the Mic that needed replacement. I recommend buying the wilson 5000 and and artistic mic. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Antenna Warning, common issue!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like spending $200. On something, I can’t use due to an antenna warning, now either have to return it or like I ended up doing to get it fix $100 later...WTF! Plus they lowered the price $25 after I bought it!🤬
customer_reviews.author: David Downing

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth has never worked and it quit receiving 3 months in. Complete junk! It was passed return window so just out the money
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Noble

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RADIO
customer_reviews.text: This is a VERY NICE RADIO. I like it very much. And just for the record I never give anything five stars if I even do a reviews. I don't like to review thing.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Everything I need!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this unit from the start! Ease of set up, programming and calibration all made simple. Love the weather bands while traveling and living in a motorhome. The color screens are great on the eyes while driving either into the sun or away. Push button programming for all other features, including a clock display.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your time... 2nd unit and the talk back STILL don't work... comes and goes... mainly not working... COBRA def has a bad batch out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my dump truck and the repeat function is great, as I have to get out if the truck often, it's nice to get in hit the button and catch any info I may have missed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: radio is a great radio at $100.00 over that not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is a good basic C.B. radio for the price point of 100 bucks.. It is not worth it over that .. there are better radios for the $150 range.. when it goes down to 100 bucks again pick up one but more than that do not bother.... ;-)
customer_reviews.author: tonytee1968

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Talks awesome right out of the box. On my first radio check I was asked if it was turned up because of my TX signal. Great features and looks. Only con is it is a big unit and installation will take some planning. Mine is installed on the passenger side center console of my 1998 4Runner.
customer_reviews.author: dsmithjr

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing, everything you need is in this unit
customer_reviews.text: Installed only a few weeks ago and tonight I made contact on channel 6 skip from Minnesota to Virginia, no modifications to the unit, just stock power. Absolutely amazing, everything you need is in this unit.
customer_reviews.author: stormrat

customer_reviews.title: cobra 29
customer_reviews.text: I gave this cb a average rating because I brought it for a new truck that we are building so I haven't had a chance to use it
customer_reviews.author: jtstar

customer_reviews.title: Nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy in my car. Drilled a couple of screw holes and attached the bracket and cb and the coaxial cable and good to go! Should have spent a little more and bought the blue tooth model though for hands free device.
customer_reviews.author: mark krans

customer_reviews.title: Great features, but died after less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this radio, but it has lasted just under a year. It was purchased September 2016. I was able to play music from my phone through my stereo and take incoming calls through the CB. Call audio quality wasn't great, but good enough. Screen brightness was spot on and I liked the weather alert features. 2-3 months ago, I began having issues with the bluetooth function. Now the radio is stuck "on". Kind of... The display glows, but there's nothing there. Will not transmit or receive Makes a brief static noise, when I operate the channel selector knob. No way to turn the radio completely off, without unplugging it.
customer_reviews.author: K Michael Lindbloom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Has a problem with sound and have to key the mic. Every once in a while to be able to hear the sound!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Cordle

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Only downside is the speaker. I have mine in a Jeep XJ with mud tires... might have to invest in an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t receive
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t receive. I’ve had it for months and just wondered why no one has talked to me. I hooked up an old one and it’s because this new one doesn’t receive. It transmits well but even the weather doesn't come in.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: The mic has already stopped working, gonna have to ...
customer_reviews.text: The mic has already stopped working, gonna have to spend more money for a new one. The radio is just now 2 months old
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Loud and clear
customer_reviews.text: A great product That was easy to install! Just make sure you buy a great Atena to match this product! When talking on it you sound loud and clear
customer_reviews.author: DwainP67

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Features u need and pretty colors.
customer_reviews.text: It lets u tune it yourself. If something is wrong it tells you. Easy to use, the features are what people really need to have. Don't be fooled by people saying the knob "broke off" it broke off because they broke it off. Yes, the knob in question does poke out a good ways, but it isn't flimsy. Cobra wouldn't be around as long as it has if they made stuff easy to break. I like the way it works, how it works, and what it offers for functionality. Its been worth every red cent to me and I am happy I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great radio to have
customer_reviews.text: First may I say the radio came in 2 WEEKS EARLY!!! This radio is so perfect for what I need. It looks good, works good, it can resist being in the sun all day in my car and will still work fine. I highly recommend this to anyone buying a CB. The Bluetooth works too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Carr

customer_reviews.title: It's a CB. It works, but that's about it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really not impressed with this unit. If I was to do it again I'd just get an "old school" CB. The SWR meter never moves and the sensitivity of the digital gauges is very weak. The radio works fine though, but there are better options. The multicolor LED display is nice. I got this on a great sale, so it was worth the price, but I would never pay retail for this CB.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Guy

customer_reviews.title: Quality..good finish
customer_reviews.text: Hard to read from driver position..small button for high hands..quality good..easy to.check power and antenna
customer_reviews.author: Samysamy

customer_reviews.title: I like it. 1 star knocked off because the display ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. 1 star knocked off because the display is really unforgiving about viewing off angle. Otherwise its a standard cobra 29 with a perdy face. 👍
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice fetuses like changing the screen color comes in handy during night driving. Only fall back I've had with this is the weather tests. I set my radio to alert me of any weather messages just in case I'm driving into something and every Wednesday around noon on multiple channels from 11-12 that damn thing keeps going off and scares the crap oit of me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Package came damaged and antenna did not work. Will try and return
customer_reviews.author: Flea

customer_reviews.title: Not accommodating to my vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with on/off switch and squelch knobs. Too small and not easily adjustable Unit is too bulky for a private vehicle. My dodge ram 2500 does not accommodate this cb.
customer_reviews.author: Frank R,Monahan

customer_reviews.title: If you have a cb already and want to upgrade this is your product.
customer_reviews.text: This product doesnt come with everything you need to get running, and its a pain in the ass to get working. The one thing that is cool about this product is the weather, and emergency bands.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Carey

customer_reviews.title: Comes Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: If you check the trucker websites and bulletin boards like I did before making this purchase you'll find that everyone that made the recommendation was spot on. Especially helpful is the NOAA weather band that is always available and giving up to the minute forecasts. Be sure to have your antenna tuned, as with any other radio, a tuned antenna is a must to get the most out of your radio set.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stompanado

customer_reviews.title: Great CB
customer_reviews.text: Love the ability to tune the handmike and the antenna without an SWR meter. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: As a trucker I think this is a good unit
customer_reviews.author: Robert Gilkison

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: These CB work great. I have bought over 50 of these for the company I work for and they have no issues. Sometimes someone else will always buy a cheaper one, but that last about 3 months and stops working, not to mention, they just don't reach as far as these do, thus it is aggravating to employees. I have only turned two back to Amazon, both did not come on when powered up. Note that the Black case CB is $4 more then the Chrome case CB.
customer_reviews.author: Rocco S. Rossetti

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and his coworkers said this was a good buy and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fisher

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Categorized as a marine radio,did not meet my needs.appeared to be a Quality product
customer_reviews.author: Alex G.

customer_reviews.title: You'll be glad you did!!
customer_reviews.text: This is what you want, a good cb radio, has alot of features and TX/RX like a champ. NOAA is awesome not just your area on the weather but 150 mile radius which is great. I can't praise this CB enough. With the 4 squre 4 year warranty for 10$ extra its a no brainer Good Job Cobra! .... COBRA NATION !
customer_reviews.author: Marc D.

customer_reviews.title: COBRA
customer_reviews.text: Great CB radio , nice color choices and easy to understand, would reccomend to any one who may looking for a radio .
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Rios

customer_reviews.title: Very nice unit packed with features that would have normally required ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice unit packed with features that would have normally required multiple separate purchases. Worked as advertised and am satisfied with purchase. Should provide years of service.
customer_reviews.author: thebear

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE
customer_reviews.text: Had it for LESS THAN A YEAR! Does not work anymore used it last hunting season, went to put it back in the truck for this season, nothing, wont work
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn H. Pardee

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: Great product, installed in 05 Silverado it looks and works great. I kept getting an antenna warning and high SWR but ended up being that it was too long, cut about 4" off and 1.0 reading now across all channels.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Like the digital window and the multi color face and new design
customer_reviews.author: Cary Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Mine is dead
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago. The first one I got did not pass the internal testing and I had to send it back. The company sent me a new one. This one lasted two years. It did well until something fried it inside. I still get the weather broadcasts just fine but the CB part is dead. I am getting a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: jackamutt

customer_reviews.title: Good radio so far....minus the damage!
customer_reviews.text: Radio came in fast and at a good price, however the volume knob has some unnatural curvature to it....still works but it difficult to turn....you would think a quality product like this would come in pristine condition!
customer_reviews.author: michael rinebold

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this CB as a gift for my boyfriend to install in his diesel. He loves it & said it works great! Great reception and great clear sound. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal J

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Cobra has lost thier way Just plain cheaply made. Mic is a joke
customer_reviews.author: Patrick-gunny- Bangs

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: We wasn't sure what we was getting when we bought it. But we know and trust the brand name Cobra we've had several over the years This one has just the right amount of 'toys' to keep him happy lol So I am happy with the purchase.. it works wonderfully well he loves the color changes the scan is really helpful at shippers that require a CB but don't post the channel and it has good range.. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio for your truck or car
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio for your truck or car . YOU MUST USE the Cobra CBRHGA1500 antenna in order to have the NOAA weather channels work. Regular CB antennas will not work as far as I know. I have not tried them all however I tried about 4 antennas I had and none of them worked until I purchased the Cobra.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cale

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It quit working today. Will not receive or send .
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Maynard

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April 2019 and stopped working. Screen just glows with no display. Good waste of 200 bucks. Worked on 1st trip and broke on 2nd trip. No heavy use, recreational user RV.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: great for mult. tasking
customer_reviews.text: i dont need to hold the phone any more plus i can talk on the cb as well
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cuevas

customer_reviews.title: Immediate display issue
customer_reviews.text: I had a display issue almost immediately after install. The backlight comes on but it doesn’t show any display info. Cobra customer service doesn’t offer any advice over the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent radio. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my son and he loves it. I saved alot of money purchasing it from you.
customer_reviews.author: Phil B.

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to install. Took about 45-60 seconds. I read some other reviews about it only working once and then either falling apart or seizing up. So I have been messing with it and locking and unlocking it about 15 times or so and it works as its supposed to. A little stiff but I prefer that ( that's what she said). Would but again if the time came.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Shutting off after 3 minute
customer_reviews.text: I received this item, connected it, tuned it, and finally tried it. The device would turn off after 3 minute of use, and the only way I could restart it was by cutting power to the radio and reconecting. Amazon sent me a new one and covered the full return of the product. New one works great! Reallly good radio
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Jolin-Rodrigue

customer_reviews.title: Don't order refurbished!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a refurbished unit. Arrived and was missing the mounting screws, scratched up pretty good and no manual. Not worth my time and money savings.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Strayer

customer_reviews.title: recommend...... if you read the manual.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had a chance to use it (have to calibrate it for the antenna. I must say though when you hook it all up. Call cobra prior to sending it back because it wont stay on. Theres a power button.... yeah I know suprise suprise, anywhoo so far I am pleased with the options it comes with feels very well manufactured, but it's a cobra so anyless would be unexpectable.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice cb with weather features Built in SWR meter was accurate Great addition to our motorhome
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works great out of the box and didn't need to adjust ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great out of the box and didn't need to adjust the swr at all. I sounded clear when talking to my buddy on our road trip. The noaa weather is a great feature to have when your in a bad weather zone or if your not sure what kind of weather your getting into.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher m. Condon jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great no problems and great price. I had it professionally tuned and six months later still working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Gruvdog

customer_reviews.title: Excellent CB radio
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is a long distance truck driver. Took some time to submit review, to see how he likes it. He claims it is very easy and does just what he needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This CB radio has all the bells and whistles. The weather station built in is of great importance and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: michael latona

customer_reviews.title: Mainly for trail use but weather channels are nice to have as
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Im running the and a little wil in my jeep. Mainly for trail use but weather channels are nice to have as well by the way the one i recived was the bluetooth version
customer_reviews.author: Johny

customer_reviews.title: It's my second one.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool works good. It's my second one. After my uniden 980ssb crapped out on me after 6 months I bought another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Overschlong

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for the weather radio features (weather alert and scan weather channels). I previously had like features on company business band land mobile radio. I did have some problems setting up antenna on existing rooftop NMO mount already in vehicle. After getting radio tech to sort out the antenna issue, I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good radio, but not the apps
customer_reviews.text: Could have saved money and purchased a standard radio. Not many people use the cobra app for alert status. My GPS has better connection for bluetooth calls. Works good but other services dont use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Abarca

customer_reviews.title: Solid performing CB for long haul trucker
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son who is a long haul trucker. He loves it and has said the weather feature on the Cb has really helped him avoid going through hail storms in Texas and OK. he mostly uses it to stay in touch with other truckers heading in the same direction and keep tabs on accidents and radar traps.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Sauter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i ordered and works a amazing on the go. Perfect for a trucker.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Castagno

customer_reviews.title: Great CB
customer_reviews.text: I love this CB radio. Great features between the weather, CB, and PA settings. I like that you can change the color of the display to suit your vehicle more. It is a very big CB unit though so be aware. Only thing I wish is had was an "auto dim" feature that was in sync with your headlights and not just a manual dimming feature.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent radio and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: This is the second 29 LX I have purchased off Amazon (I put it in my second vehicle). Excellent radio and quick delivery. I highly recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio
customer_reviews.text: Great radio. I like everything about it. I am not a slip seat driver, I drive the same truck every day but take my equipment out at the end of every day. I paired it with a 4' Francis and has been great. My only issue is the built in SWR meter. It is not accurate at all. But I guess I read that about every radio with a built in meter.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good radio
customer_reviews.text: I used it in my semi for work. It is a good radio. Nothing to really dislike. I wish it came with an antenae though and it doesn't seem to reach out as far as the classic.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee Turner

customer_reviews.text: You can find all the information on, upgrades, and tuning, on yt. I have purchased 3 of these so far. Family members, really enjoy them. PEACE
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not working as stated. Had to return first one. The one bright spot is returns are so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Levangie

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working in 4 months. Good brand, I'm just not satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product, good signal strength, the electronic display is very visible and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Blu Norsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome full function CB
customer_reviews.text: Awesome full function CB. I swapped out my Cobra DX 19 the same day this one arrived. Cobra 29s are always my choice for CB.
customer_reviews.author: Backnthaday

product_meta.title: Cobra 29 LX MAX Smart Full Featured Professional Cb Radio, Bluetooth Legal Hands Free, Iradar App Integrated, 4-Color Lcd, Noaa Alerts, Rewind-Say-Again, Black/Silver, Black & Silver
product_meta.description: Style:29 LX MAXThe 29 LX MAX offers professional drivers a legal way to communicate safely and easily on their smartphone with the Patented CB Radio with Bluetooth Wireless Technology and enhanced Smartphone Features .The Bluetooth feature allows drivers a better way to have phone conversations on the road because calls to your mobile phone are synched with the CB radio. . A noise canceling microphone allows calls to be heard loud and clear, even over a noisy engine. Incoming audio is routed through the radio's speaker making it easy for the driver to hear who is calling with audible caller ID. The system provides one-touch protocol for compliance and gives the driver's the ability to stay focused on the road by answering, placing and terminating calls with one-touch operation. The Patented iRadar APP integration allows you to receive and report Live Police, Speed Traps, Road Hazards, Red Light Camera intersections linked to a community of radar detector and dash cam users providing a way to keep alert as you drive the highways and cities of North America. The 29 LX MAX adds one other Patented communication feature called Rewind-Say-Again that provides you with the ability to replay the last 10 seconds of signals received over the airwaves and record a 10 second personal memo that can be replayed back at any time. The radio is built on the original #1 Choice of Professional Drives, the 29 LTD Classic chassis.
feature_bullets: iRADAR APP - Receive and report live police alerts including speed traps, road hazards and red-light cameras based on the nearly 1 million iRadar users out on the road today.

BLUETOOTH - Legally use your smartphone to answer, place and terminate phone calls at the touch of a button while staying focused on the road. With a noise cancelling microphone, you can have quality conversations over the noise of the engine.

REWIND-SAY-AGAIN– Replay the last 10 seconds of a missed message that is automatically recorded with a digital voice recorder so you never have to miss valuable information and you can also record a 10 second memo to replay at anytime.
NOAA WEATHER CHANNELS - Be the first to know of incoming hazards or changing weather with instant access to NOAA weather channels 24 hours a day and an audible tone warning from the station.

NIGHTWATCH - Fully illuminated customizable LCD colored display in blue, red, green and amber for easy viewing in day or nighttime conditions so you can stay focused on the road without distracting bright lights.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,200 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
